meanings.sent1: I picked some morello cherries from the tree.
meanings.sent2: The pie was filled with delicious morello cherries.
meanings.sent3: The morello cherries made my face pucker up!
meanings.sent4: Her lips were as red as morello cherries.
meanings.sent5: The morello cherries looked like tiny red jewels on the branch.

meanings.sent1: She painted her nails a vibrant morello shade.
meanings.sent2: The sunset painted the sky in beautiful morello hues.
meanings.sent3: The morello color of the dress made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: His cheeks turned morello with embarrassment.
meanings.sent5: The morello of the roses was deep and rich, almost like velvet.

meanings.sent1: The farmer harvested baskets of ripe morello plums.
meanings.sent2: The jam was made from sweet morello plums.
meanings.sent3: The morello plums were so juicy, they dripped down my chin.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet as morello plums.
meanings.sent5: The morello plums had a unique flavor that was both tart and sweet.
